site.description: Contains core plug-ins of the Boomslang Test Generator. Does not contain transitive dependencies to xtext & Co. Use this update site to keep being up-to-date with the latest Boomslang version.

category-def.name: org.boomslang.geneator.geb.repository
category-def.label: Geb Generator Bundles
